title: Remember to change the Thresh lantern "Did you know"
body: When the game is loading sometimes the "Did you know" ransom fact it gives you sometimes says something like "Thresh's lantern is a prison for many souls including Senna, Lucian's wife" but that isnt relevant anymore.

replies.body:
To Be Honest if this take out...some a lot of Champs that That Bully Him about his wife interection in gameplay Before will Retcon and Take Out like Yorick " No..Lucian i not seen your wife " Their still a lot of Champs Bully him in interection.

Fact : Nunu Bot is the one who Create all Loading Screen & Everything as it Mention in there in Did U know? too.

don't worry, thresh will get it back! >:D
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
Some Thresh destroyed me as Senna and typed in all chat "get back to the lantern."
This tip has been updated. Thanks for the heads up!
Even just a slight alteration to “[...] many souls, including Senna before she escaped.” or something similar, would allow the fact to still be a helpful lore tidbit.
it ok because Senna was there before. U dont need to change it even Prison can be Be Prison Break after that.
I see you're down voted...but I actually think this is a rather interesting idea...like a part of her that she has yet to fully get back.
